headers.name: Content-Type
headers.description: Request message type. Allowed format: application/json .

parameters.name: client_id
parameters.description: ID of your developer app. To find the App ID , navigate to My Apps > App Detail > Basic Information .

parameters.name: client_secret
parameters.description: Secret of your developer app. To find the Secret , navigate to My Apps > App Detail > Basic Information .

parameters.name: grant_type
parameters.description: The way of generating the access token. The allowed enum value: refresh_token : To generate the access token by refresh token.

parameters.name: refresh_token
parameters.description: Refresh token to renew an existing access token. You can obtain the refresh token in the response of /tt_user/oauth2/token/ endpoint when you generate an access token.

top_fields.name: code
top_fields.description: Response code. For the complete list of response codes and descriptions, see Appendix - Return Codes .

top_fields.name: message
top_fields.description: Response message. For details, see Appendix - Return Codes .

fields.name: request_id
fields.description: The log ID of the request, which uniquely identifies a request.

fields.name: access_token
fields.description: The new short-term token for permission verification. The token expires in one day.

fields.name: token_type
fields.description: The type of token. Enum value: Bearer : Bearer token. Anyone in possession of the token can use it to access the associated resources.

fields.name: scope
fields.description: The scope of permissions granted to the access token.

fields.name: expires_in
fields.description: The time remaining until the access token expires, measured in seconds.

fields.name: refresh_token
fields.description: The refresh token, which can be used to renew the access token. The refresh token is valid for one year. Note : Retain this field for access_token renewal.

fields.name: refresh_token_expires_in
fields.description: The time remaining until the refresh token expires, measured in seconds.

fields.name: open_id
fields.description: Application specific unique ID of the TikTok account.
